response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire an item that could potentially be worth even more to you in the future. We understand that this is a significant investment, and we are confident that the product will exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 1100000}
